item.title: CJ add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: CJ add a quote by Philip Pullman
item.description: "I think it's perfectly possible to explain how the universe came about without bringing God into it, but I don't know everything, and there may well be a God somewhere, hiding away. Actually, if he is keeping out of sight, it's because he's ashamed of his followers and all the cruelty and ignorance they're responsible for promoting in his name. If I were him, I'd want nothing to do with them." -- Philip Pullman

item.title: CJ add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "How many observe Christ's birthday! How few, His precepts!" -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: CJ add a quote by Jon Stewart
item.description: "Yes, the long war on Christianity. I pray that one day we may live in an America where Christians can worship freely! In broad daylight! Openly wearing the symbols of their religion... perhaps around their necks? And maybe -- dare I dream it? -- maybe one day there can be an openly Christian President. Or, perhaps, 43 of them. Consecutively." -- Jon Stewart

item.title: CJ add a quote by Marti Noxon, Buffy the Vampire Slayer
item.description: "Spike (to Giles) : Oh, poor Watcher. Did your life pass before your eyes â€” 'Cuppa tea, cuppa tea... almost got shagged... cuppa tea'?" -- Marti Noxon, Buffy the Vampire Slayer

item.title: CJ add a quote by Jon Stewart
item.description: "I celebrated Thanksgiving in an old-fashioned way. I invited everyone in my neighborhood to my house, we had an enormous feast, and then I killed them and took their land." -- Jon Stewart

item.title: CJ add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "When his life was ruined, his family killed, his farm destroyed, Job knelt down on the ground and yelled up to the heavens, "Why god? Why me?" and the thundering voice of God answered, There's just something about you that pisses me off." -- Stephen King

item.title: CJ add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "The God of the Old Testament is arguably the most unpleasant character in all fiction: jealous and proud of it; a petty, unjust, unforgiving control-freak; a vindictive, bloodthirsty ethnic cleanser; a misogynistic, homophobic, racist, infanticidal, genocidal, filicidal, pestilential, megalomaniacal, sadomasochistic, capriciously malevolent bully." -- Richard Dawkins

item.title: CJ add a quote by Martha Graham
item.description: "Dance is the hidden language of the soul" -- Martha Graham

item.title: CJ add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "Sure I loved him - too much. And he loved me, only not enough. I just want someone who thinks I'm number one in his life. I'm not willing to accept emotional scraps anymore." -- Amy Tan

item.title: CJ add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "I hid my deepest feelings so well I forgot where I placed them." -- Amy Tan

item.title: CJ add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "I did not lose myself all at once. I rubbed out my face over the years washing away my pain, the same way carvings on stone are worn down by water. " -- Amy Tan

item.title: CJ add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "But I will win and give her my spirit, because this is the way a mother loves her daughter. -Ying Ying" -- Amy Tan

item.title: CJ add a quote by Sophocles
item.description: "Alas, how terrible is wisdom when it brings no profit to the man that's wise! This I knew well, but had forgotten it, else I would not have come here." -- Sophocles
